name: Emoji Sort Puzzle
description:
Emoji Sort Puzzle is simple but fun and addictive Puzzle game for all ages! solve the game by sorting emojis just tap emoji and switch same emojis to the tubes and make them sort correctly. It can help you in logic building. A challenging yet relaxing game to training your brain!

How to play:

• Tap any tube to move the emoji lie on the top.

• Move emoji to another tube with same emoji on the top.

• Match all emojis to win.

• If you get really stuck don’t worry, you can always restart the level at any time.
